plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 02-1275

                        ROBERT R. GIRARD,

                      Plaintiff, Appellant,

                               v.

    DONALD W. WYATT DETENTION FACILITY INCORPORATION, ET AL.,

                     Defendants, Appellees.



                          ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on November 5, 2002 is
amended as follows:

     On page 7 line 4 change "injustice" to "justice".
